verses.verse: The sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> the firstborn <WH1060> of Israel <WH3478> (for he was the firstborn; <WH1060> but, <WH2490> because he defiled his father <WH1>'s couch, <WH3326> his birthright <WH1062> was given <WH5414> to the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> the son <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> and the genealogy is not to be reckoned <WH3187> after the birthright. <WH1062>
For Judah <WH3063> prevailed <WH1396> above his brothers, <WH251> and of him came the prince; <WH5057> but the birthright <WH1062> was Joseph <WH3130>'s:)
the sons <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> the firstborn <WH1060> of Israel: <WH3478> Hanoch, <WH2585> and Pallu, <WH6396> Hezron, <WH2696> and Carmi. <WH3756>
The sons <WH1121> of Joel: <WH3100> Shemaiah <WH8098> his son, <WH1121> Gog <WH1463> his son, <WH1121> Shimei <WH8096> his son, <WH1121>
Micah <WH4318> his son, <WH1121> Reaiah <WH7211> his son, <WH1121> Baal <WH1168> his son, <WH1121>
Beerah <WH880> his son, <WH1121> whom Tilgath Pilneser <WH8407> king <WH4428> of Assyria <WH804> carried away <WH1540> captive: <WH5387> he was prince of the Reubenites. <WH7206>
His brothers <WH251> by their families, <WH4940> when the genealogy <WH3187> of their generations <WH8435> was reckoned: <WH3187> the chief, <WH7218> Jeiel, <WH3273> and Zechariah, <WH2148>

and Bela <WH1106> the son <WH1121> of Azaz, <WH5811> the son <WH1121> of Shema, <WH8087> the son <WH1121> of Joel, <WH3100> who lived <WH3427> in Aroer, <WH6177> even to Nebo <WH5015> and Baal Meon: <WH1186>

and eastward <WH4217> he lived <WH3427> even to the entrance <WH935> of the wilderness <WH4057> from the river <WH5104> Euphrates, <WH6578> because their livestock <WH4735> were multiplied <WH7235> in the land <WH776> of Gilead. <WH1568>

In the days <WH3117> of Saul, <WH7586> they made <WH6213> war <WH4421> with the Hagrites, <WH1905> who fell <WH5307> by their hand; <WH3027> and they lived <WH3427> in their tents <WH168> throughout <WH6440> all the land east <WH4217> of Gilead. <WH1568>
The sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> lived <WH3427> over against them, <WH776> in the land of Bashan <WH1316> to Salecah: <WH5548>
Joel <WH3100> the chief, <WH7218> and Shapham <WH8223> the second, <WH4932> and Janai, <WH3285> and Shaphat <WH8202> in Bashan. <WH1316>

Their brothers <WH251> of their fathers <WH1>' houses: <WH1004> Michael, <WH4317> and Meshullam, <WH4918> and Sheba, <WH7652> and Jorai, <WH3140> and Jacan, <WH3275> and Zia, <WH2127> and Eber, <WH5677> seven. <WH7651>

These were the sons <WH1121> of Abihail, <WH32> the son <WH1121> of Huri, <WH2359> the son <WH1121> of Jaroah, <WH3386> the son <WH1121> of Gilead, <WH1568> the son <WH1121> of Michael, <WH4317> the son <WH1121> of Jeshishai, <WH3454> the son <WH1121> of Jahdo, <WH3163> the son <WH1121> of Buz; <WH938>
Ahi <WH277> the son <WH1121> of Abdiel, <WH5661> the son <WH1121> of Guni, <WH1476> chief <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>' houses. <WH1004>
They lived <WH3427> in Gilead <WH1568> in Bashan, <WH1316> and in its towns, <WH1323> and in all the suburbs <WH4054> of Sharon, <WH8289> as far as their borders. <WH8444>

All these were reckoned by genealogies <WH3187> in the days <WH3117> of Jotham <WH3147> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> and in the days <WH3117> of Jeroboam <WH3379> king <WH4428> of Israel. <WH3478>

The sons <WH1121> of Reuben, <WH7205> and the Gadites, <WH1425> and the half-tribe <WH2677> <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> of valiant men, <WH582> men <WH2428> able to bear <WH5375> buckler <WH4043> and sword, <WH2719> and to shoot <WH1869> with bow, <WH7198> and skillful <WH3925> in war, <WH4421> were forty <WH705> - four <WH702> thousand <WH505> seven <WH7651> hundred <WH3967> and sixty, <WH8346> that were able to go forth <WH3318> to war. <WH6635>
They made <WH6213> war <WH4421> with the Hagrites, <WH1905> with Jetur, <WH3195> and Naphish, <WH5305> and Nodab. <WH5114>

They were helped <WH5826> against them, <WH1905> and the Hagrites were delivered <WH5414> into their hand, <WH3027> and all who were with them; <WH2199> for they cried to God <WH430> in the battle, <WH4421> and he was entreated <WH6279> of them, <WH982> because they put their trust in him.

They took away <WH7617> their livestock; <WH4735> of their camels <WH1581> fifty <WH2572> thousand, <WH505> and of sheep <WH6629> two hundred <WH3967> fifty <WH2572> thousand, <WH505> and of donkeys <WH2543> two thousand, <WH505> and of men <WH120> one hundred <WH3967> thousand. <WH505>
For there fell <WH5307> many <WH7227> slain, <WH2491> because the war <WH4421> was of God. <WH430> They lived <WH3427> in their place until the captivity. <WH1473>

The children <WH1121> of the half-tribe <WH2677> <WH7626> of Manasseh <WH4519> lived <WH3427> in the land: <WH776> they increased <WH7235> from Bashan <WH1316> to Baal Hermon <WH1179> and Senir <WH8149> and Mount <WH2022> Hermon. <WH1179>

These were the heads <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>' houses: <WH1004> even Epher, <WH6081> and Ishi, <WH3469> and Eliel, <WH447> and Azriel, <WH5837> and Jeremiah, <WH3414> and Hodaviah, <WH1938> and Jahdiel, <WH3164> mighty <WH1368> men <WH582> of valor, <WH2428> famous <WH8034> men, <WH582> heads <WH7218> of their fathers <WH1>' houses. <WH1004>

They trespassed <WH4603> against the God <WH430> of their fathers, <WH1> and played the prostitute <WH2181> after <WH310> the gods <WH430> of the peoples <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> whom God <WH430> destroyed <WH8045> before them. <WH6440>

The God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> stirred up <WH5782> the spirit <WH7307> of Pul <WH6322> king <WH4428> of Assyria, <WH804> and the spirit <WH7307> of Tilgath Pilneser <WH8407> king <WH4428> of Assyria, <WH804> and he carried them away, <WH1540> even the Reubenites, <WH7206> and the Gadites, <WH1425> and the half-tribe <WH2677> <WH7626> of Manasseh, <WH4519> and brought <WH935> them to Halah, <WH2477> and Habor, <WH2249> and Hara, <WH2024> and to the river <WH5104> of Gozan, <WH1470> to this day. <WH3117>
